name: Touch of Torment
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Target creature becomes surrounded by flickering obsidian flames whispering of their final fate. Whenever they take fire damage, the flames flare up and deal an additional 1d6 fire damage. Whenever they take unholy damage, the flames whisper louder and impose disadvantage on their next attack roll.

A creature can spend 2 AP during their turn to make an Intuition saving throw to end the spell early on a success.
empower: Pay the empower cost in hit points instead of MP. Fire damage increased to 2d6. Unholy damage imposes disadvantage on all attack rolls they make during their turn.
